website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Royal Trainer MT was regarded as stylish and durable by many purchases. Overall, it was considered a great walking shoe as it delivered a comfortable platform for all-day wear.
pros: Numerous people claimed that the Reebok Royal Trainer MT was comfortable for all-day use
The style and the color options pleased many owners
The shoe was deemed to be durable by its long-time users
Several consumers appreciated its affordable price
Some reviewers thought that the trainer offered a perfect fit
A few testers were satisfied with the support provided by the product
cons: A fair amount of wearers found the footwear to be stiff
apparently, it required a break-in period to become comfortable
Some commenters did not like that it felt heavy
The shoe looked bulky, according to a few individuals

customer_reviews.title: Must have gotten a lemon as the rubber base began peeling off
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was comfortable and have be using it every other day for three months, since I have been rotating it along with another shoe. I have planters fasciitis, so I have not been doing much walking on them. However, I was saddened when the bottom piece, the rubber part that touches the ground, began to peel away from the back of the shoe after a (3) month life span. Shoes are too dangerous to use now (trip hazard), so I plan to discard them and look for shoes elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: KnightTrader

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommended
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are built VERY well. I walk daily (outdoors - all year) in New England .. Snow/Ice. Every other "economical" walking shoe I've tried has the same design flaws - 1.) the glue that affixes the bottom at the toes gives out. 2.) They start to leak moisture(wet socks). These shoes DO NOT suffer from these issues. I've tried several brands (in this price range) over the last 6-7 years, and I've found these prove to be the most durable. The foam-fitting works as expected. * I waited until I am well into my second pair to provide this review. HIGHLY recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KJD

customer_reviews.title: These are fit as expected and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: On the first time wearing them, they initially felt a little tight when I first put them on. My first thought was they weren't going to work for me. It only took a very short time (15 minutes or so) walking in them for them to feel comfortable. Since then, they are very comfortable to wear for just about all of the day. I normally wear an 11-1/2 size shoes. I ordered these Reeboks in 11-1/2 and they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sean in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Tough and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 10.5D and could have been just as happy with a size 11 depending on the socks I wear, but the fit is just fine. As some reviewers noted, they feel a little tight/small at first. Once you wear them, the memory foam does its magic and conforms to your feet. VERY comfortable. These are not really running shoes and won't feel like bedroom slippers (at first) like a new pair of running shoes would feel. These would not be my first choice for running shoes. That is not what they were designed to be. They are a little stiffer, heavier, and tougher than running shoes. I like them a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta User

customer_reviews.title: This Reebok is a size 7 4E. I'm wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: This Reebok is a size 7 4E. I'm wearing a Reebok size 7 4E right now as I have done for many years. Even if I loosen all the laces to the extreme this Reebok Men's Royal Mt Cross Trainer is still much too small. From what I have read on other reviews this is a common problem with Reebok. Some people suggest order 1 size larger then usual. Or is the problem if it's not a over $100. shoe they don't care how the shoe is made. Rather then go through the hassle of returning shoe's that don't fit, probably will just buy a different brand shoe...
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Not the best experience
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace my current Reebok trainer. However to my disappointment, this shoe caused stress to my left heel and tendon resulting in a very uncomfortable walk. Moreover the right sole feels uneven and I seem to feel the "circle" on the sole as if there is something under the shoe cushion. I am not sure if this shoe was simply not right for me. I am returning this shoe and will keep looking for another one and hopefully will get something in Reebok make since I have had good experience in the past and would like to give it another chance.
customer_reviews.author: SRP

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for being on your feet all day
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes for a couple months now and they continue to feel great. I bought these shoes to replace a pair of reebok work shoes that had worn out, thought cross trainers might give my feet some better support. I am on my feet all day at work, rarely sitting down so my feet get pretty tired. I love the padding and memory foam. Some of the best shoes I have ever worn for being on my feet all day. As for size issues some people seem to have, I have worn many pairs of reeboks so i know what size i need to order, every brand sizes differently.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F

customer_reviews.title: The exact shoe my dad was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My father has a very old paid of Reebok's and I was worried when I looked for a new pair for him that I wouldn't find them or a comparable pair. I saw the label on a little tag on the shoes and realized they were very similar to the ones he owned. I took a chance and they were a perfect match for him and provide him with the support he needs. He is hard to buy for so this is definitely a WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Alecia A. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Large and bulky but very stable.
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are big and sort of clunky but solid and stable like nothing else. I definitely agree with the other reviewers, by a size bigger than normal, I did and they fit perfectly. The memory foam padding inside is great, I have been wearing these for a few months now and they are still cushy. This is a good sneaker if you need STABILITY like in cross training or shooting hoops. Its not real light and does makes a distinctive "clunk" when you walk. Similar to the Nike Monarch sneaker but slightly heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who has a job that requires him to be on his feet. He loved them so much that he had me buy a second pair when he wore his first pair out. He's tried different shoes with memory foam, including the Dr. Schoal's (sp?) brand, but these have been his favorite. The first pair we bought were the normal fit and the second pair were the wide fit. He preferred the wide fit, probably because he has very flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Am liking the 14 4E at $41
customer_reviews.text: I have a problematic left foot with bunion that prefers 5E shoes with plenty of toe room. Depending on the cut and toe room, 13 5E or 14 5E will work. This Reebok's 14 4E works comfortable for the left foot, but the right shoe is slightly loose requiring an additional insole. So for $40, am pleased and may buy again. Too bad 13.5 sizes aren't more available for my needs. Regarding style, construction, function .. these provide me with a stable, secure platform for working out in a gym. There also seems to be some ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ole Blue Eyes

customer_reviews.title: A Great Shoe IF you Go One Size Up.
customer_reviews.text: The key to this shoe is buying it a full size larger than you are accustomed to (in my case from a 12D to 13D). If you do that, it is a great walking shoe, with the memory foam padding every bit as cushy as the Reebok DMX Max air pocket construction that had been my standard in the past. Also these are considerably cheaper than DMX Max, and not prone to the squeak those shoes often developed.
customer_reviews.author: VLR

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes...I used to wear Reeboks all the time but switched to Nikes a few years ago. This time the Nikes were not available so back to the Reeboks and am I glad. They fit like they were made on my feet and really feed good walking around in them. Can't go wrong with these shoes for the price .
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Williams

customer_reviews.title: Padding too thin for me.
customer_reviews.text: The reason for only 3 stars is the padding in the bottom is a thin pad that is very well glued in. So if you are like me & prefer to use gel pads, you risk damaging the shoe pulling it out. At work I'm on my feet 8-12 hours a day & the stock padding isn't cutting it. For weekends they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: john yocco

customer_reviews.title: NOT the Quality I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Second pair. First one lasted less than 10 months and started to fall apart. Second pair didn't make it six months. Reebok shouldn't be so cheap on the adhesive. Bottom came apart from base. Switched to the Reebok Men's Daily Cushion 2.0 RS Walking Shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rowell

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the size 8 mans and they were tight ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the size 8 mans and they were tight, I figure they will stretch a bit!, ordered same shoe in size 8.5 and they were just barely bigger than the 8, still tight. I have bought a lot of Reebok shoes over the time and they have always been size 8, just don't know why these fit so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C.

customer_reviews.title: New ones fit great. No problems with the return
customer_reviews.text: I didn't pay attention to the reviews that these run a bit small. When they came, they were indeed too tight, so I sent them back. New ones fit great. No problems with the return. Great shoes. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Retired flyboy

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fell apart after only 4 months of wear ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fell apart after only 4 months of wear, the stitching on the top left shoe started to unravel and right shoes top leather cracked. This is not what I would expect from a pair of Reeboks.As a former fan of Reeboks I will look elsewhere for a new pair of cross-trainers.
customer_reviews.author: desertscape

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but be careful of the size!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is good looking and well built, however, be aware that as many reviews have stated they run narrow. I have a very narrow foot and ordered the standard size and they fit comfortably snug. If you have a normal width foot, order at least a half size larger and if you have a wide foot be careful and order at least one size larger (my guess). Since they fit my foot I think they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Levron

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, supportive without hurting arches.
customer_reviews.text: I already had three pair of these and was purchasing a fourth--to replace a pair that has worn out after almost a year. Obviously, I love these shoes. The arch isn't nearly as high as the Merrells I used to wear until the high arch on the Merrells started giving me foot pain. I can wear these all day without pain--and they cost about a third of the amount the Merrells were running me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable sneaker.... but not what I hoped for. No complaints it’s well built, but I do a lot of standing on concrete floors, I will continue to use them in my rotation daily. No regrets, just wishing for some more cushion. I was going to go to a 3 star, but it’s my work that makes things harder, I’d recommend this sneaker to the average person.
customer_reviews.author: ma1000

customer_reviews.title: Sole material shortens shoe fit.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size 9 1/2 and usually have no problems. This pair was so tight my toes almost touched the front interior of the shoe. There is some additional material on the inside sole which is why it didn't fit. I read reviews on this shoe and there were others that had the same problem. Replacement shoe was much better. The upgrade to size 10 solved the fit problem. There is a buildup of material in the sole and tongue of the shoe requiring one upgrade in fit.
customer_reviews.author: wltslt

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in Reeboks.
customer_reviews.text: Inside cloth of shoes started tearing within first 2 months. Filling stared falling out within another month. Upper inside heel of right shoe is completely torn and all stuffing has fallen out. Stuffing inside bottom of right shoe is also falling out. Quality is obviously lacking. Very surprising for Reebok. I Only walk in shoes, 3-4 miles per day; no heavy running or even heavy sports. Certainly can't recommend the Royal Mt. Cross-Trainer. Feel free to contact me for more info. dhoisch@earthlink.net
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise good tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: Previous reviews indicated they run small so I ordered 1/2 size larger. They actually run true to size though. Otherwise good tennis shoe; no complaints. Comfortable. I use them on daily basis for normal activity. I use different shoes for working out & running (lighter weight Asics).
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: 5 like me, you need a 10
customer_reviews.text: OK these sneakers fits small but they fit large. What do I mean? As in the traditional Reebox way, these sneakers need to be ordered in a half size bigger than you would order a Nike. If you usually order a 9.5 like me, you need a 10. In that way, they fit small. The sneakers themselves are very large in width and looks like a geriatric sneaker. I have been made fun of already, no offense to the elderly, but I will keep them for my retirement.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F. Mcgannon

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY - ESPECIALLY since the final return date was November ...
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten these on October 4th as a gift for my son for his birthday in November. I ended up giving them to him early - only to find out that one shoe is bigger than other! NOT HAPPY - ESPECIALLY since the final return date was November 4th. In fact I'm furious for having paid so much only to get inferior products.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: and comfortable enough that he can wear them to his 12 ...
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased these for my husband several times. It can be difficult to find shoes in the 4E width that he likes. These are neutral enough to match everything, durable, and comfortable enough that he can wear them to his 12 hour shifts at work comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: NoahandPeytonsMama

customer_reviews.title: The look of the shoe is great and over all is a comfortable shoe for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The look of the shoe is great and over all is a comfortable shoe for the price. I normally wear a size 10 D (Med.) but based on a number of reviews I chose a half size larger and ordered a 10.5 D (Med.). Width wise it was spot on but length wise if I were to order today I would go a full size larger and order an 11 D (Med.)
customer_reviews.author: Gary F.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes, good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. I paid $ 37.99. Very comfortable. Little to no break in. These actually feel like a true 4E wide shoes compared to some I've ordered (Fila) highly recommend these. They feel well made too. Good quality shoe for the money. I will definitely save these in my favorites for possible future repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny J.

customer_reviews.title: boks
customer_reviews.text: These are almost comfortable, but they might need a break-in period. I can wear them for a few hours before the side of my right foot starts to smart a little. They should be ok in a week or so, hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: duff

customer_reviews.title: Should have been like and the same size as my other Reebok DMX shoes.
customer_reviews.text: She shoe was short compared with 3 other Reebok size 9 DMX shoes and this style doesn't have the padding under the sole and heel like my other DMX shoes have which is what I wanted in white.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: small and stiff loses the race!
customer_reviews.text: Very tight and stiff. In order to get my foot in the toe box, I had to completely undo the laces and shove my foot in. The length and width are both off. I sized a half up to compensate, but which I had done a whole size or even a size and a half. Being stiff leather, I hope after breaking in that they will be somewhat comfortable, although will still need to buy longer laces to compensate. I'd pass on these.
customer_reviews.author: Sajijoma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband, who has wide feet. It's difficult to find shoes in the store that are comfortable for him. He tried these on and was happy with the fit from the start! Excellent product for the money, snd the fit is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mockingbird50

customer_reviews.text: returning them - they have some material that pushed on my big toe as soon as I put the shoes on. I have gotten these in the past without any fitting problem so I'm thinking this is a one time deal of having to return this product. I hate the hassle of returning stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, as expected
customer_reviews.text: Have always liked Reebok shoes and these do not disappoint either. As soon as this pair wears out I'll be back for more. I usually get about a year on these as I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: ratflinger

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!  Too small and narrow by 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9.5 or 10 D. I have never had a E width and I am now 63. To be safe, I ordered an 11D. It was way too small and was too narrow. I was hoping they would break in. They did not and I developed a callas on my right big toe. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and a high instep and these shoes fit great. They are hard to find. I take out the insole and put in mine so the fit is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Snickers

customer_reviews.title: Lack of quality.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. I love that Reebok makes decently priced, comfortable wide shoes. The one issue I encountered is that they fell about after 3 months. Even for the price I bought them for I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: M-Train

customer_reviews.title: I should have not purchased the shoes they didn’t fit me at all
customer_reviews.text: I just don’t like the issue is I never more much I shouldn’t bottom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just too small...
customer_reviews.text: Size 8 1/2 D: Tight fit across the instep and too short. They must have been mis-sized as I wear a standard 8 1/2 D. The fit was comfortable from the instep/arch back so a larger size would have been too big.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this footwear for my workouts using ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this footwear for my workouts using weights. I observed that I find it easier to do my leg workouts. My squats and lunges are just on point. I feel totally balanced wen I stand on my feet. I hope to send more review after I run with it.
customer_reviews.author: ceejay

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.text: Having somewhat big feet, it's VERY hard to find shoes in my size. And even if they do say 15 on them, they don't always fit. I don't like buying shoes without the benefit of trying them on first but I took a chance with these and they fit great! The best pair of shoes I've had in ages.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I listened to the reviews & ordered these one size larger. Fit my husband great! He loves these even more than Dr. Scholls or New Balance tennis shoes!
customer_reviews.author: SKS

customer_reviews.title: fit and finish were good, but they were just to big
customer_reviews.text: The shoe seemed to be well cushioned on the bottom, fit and finish were good, but they were just to big. I haven't wore any Reebok shoes in a while, the last pair that I had wore were size 8 and they fit. maybe Reebok sizing is different now than it used to be. I sent this pair back.
customer_reviews.author: TONY R

customer_reviews.title: with the sides of his feet like most do
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He is very picky on Tennis shoes. This pair seems to be working well. He complained slightly about the stiffness but it's not causing him issues, with the sides of his feet like most do, when he plays tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend that always wears this brand. The fit is awesome and still will always be his favorite shoe and brand.
customer_reviews.author: liz phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy and I adore with this BRAND
customer_reviews.author: kawther

customer_reviews.title: reeboks- the best crosstraining shoes around
customer_reviews.text: i walk 20-25 miles a week for exercise, have been doing it for over 8 years now. reebok has always given me the best bang for the buck. they are always good for at least 1000 miles, sometimes up to 1100. other brands (fila, starter) are worn through in less than 200. if you want a long lasting, comfortable cross training shoe, you want reebok.
customer_reviews.author: RobinRater

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at good price
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these same shoes before and they fit great and wear great so that is why I bought another pair. I use them to play racquetball on cement courts and they last better then any other shoes I have bought
customer_reviews.author: Rick Prinzo

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have only had them for a day, so I can not comment on durability or long term quality, but they appear to be well made. I had read earlier reviews, and noted that many were saying the shoes are small for their stated size, so I went to a local store to make sure I was ordering the correct size. I am glad I did, as they do seem to run about a half to full size smaller than similar shoes I have had in the past. As of right now I am pleased with the shoe and would order again if I needed another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Dale 300

customer_reviews.title: Sad, rarely write a bad review
customer_reviews.text: Ordered white, got black, box mangled, no paperwork in box. Out of hundreds of Amazon orders this is the first time returning. *The 'fits as expected' is on the replacement not this returned item. Email I received just now is still tied to this returned order apparently.
customer_reviews.author: M Higgins

customer_reviews.title: nice sneaker but a bit snug in the width for a normal width
customer_reviews.text: although classified as normal width/"D", this pair is rubbing my left outer toe and is uncomfortable .. will try to get in a wider size for better fit. Update 10/2/2015. Received size 10.5D which fits my size 10 foot. more comfortable.. suggestion -- order a size larger that you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are very comfortable, although maybe slightly too large from toe to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just put these on for the first time out of the box. Shoes are very comfortable, although maybe slightly too large from toe to heel. I usually wear 10.5 E, these feel like 11E. Strange since most find that these run small. They are a little on the heavy side, I would not recommend using them for competitive running. But, for everyday use or walking, these are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Allen S. Pisani

customer_reviews.title: They run a size small not half size small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these according to the reviews half a size larger, but they are quite a bit narrower in the toe area and they are uncomfortable for my husband to wear, even loosening the shoe strings, he does not have a wide foot either, average. Other than that the foot bed felt good ,he said, but he is unable to wear them, so I am going to give them away to someone who wears a size smaller, its a big disappointment. I gave them 3 stars because they aren't terrible shoes, but for someone who always wears size 11 in everything- it is crazy that a well known brand would not fit him bought online, especially a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Robinblythe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but may need to order wider ones next
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but may need to order wider ones next. Will wait to break them in before I decide cause they are just what I wanted in an everyday tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kauai Girl

customer_reviews.title: ... wide because that's what my Nike's were that fit great. I have wide
customer_reviews.text: I intentionally got the 4E wide because that's what my Nike's were that fit great. I have wide, flat feet. The 4E is almost too wide. I wonder what the regular size is like. But I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are my first choice in casual footwear. I have worn Reebok products for years and keep coming back for their comfort and fit. My office setting is very casual and these shoes go well in this environment.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Yurecka

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for Me.
customer_reviews.text: When you wear 13 they all look like barges. Why are they $20.00 cheaper than the white ones I bought? Otherwise they seem fine for what I need need them for, which is just to work around the house. They seem durable. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: TKaz

customer_reviews.title: I ordered an 11. 5 shoe and I couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 11.5 shoe and I couldn't begin to get my foot into the shoe. If I had to guess...it was more a 9.5 - 10 size. I've never had this problem before so I thought I'd leave this review. Order at least 1.5 -2 sizes larger than you wear to get the correct shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Gartin

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 10. 5. I normally order 11 ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 10.5. I normally order 11 to make sure I have room, but this construction gives me lots of room for my toes, which is the reason I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes especially for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are a very comfortable shoe. My husband had to break them in the first time he wore them he was ready to get them off after 10 hours, but after that first time they were great!! They are a very good looking shoe as well. I am very very happy with this choice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: then it's nice and properly snug
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam makes the shoe feel really tight (almost too small) until the memory foam adjusts to your foot, then it's nice and properly snug.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tassin

customer_reviews.title: Good Price. Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband has three pairs of these. The good pair, the grungy pair, and the really grungy pair. The fit is consistent. He's been happy with the style for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschooling Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby. He loves his Reebok's. A great show at a terrific price.
customer_reviews.author: love2read

customer_reviews.title: Although the shoe fit's as expected and is comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Although the shoe fit's as expected and is comfortable to wear, I am disappointed that the left shoe has developed a small crack on top of sneaker near the stitching. The material appears to be a little thin here. It's really too bad because I find the shoes to be comfortable, but I don't wear them daily and they are less than 2 months old. I would return them but I am just outside the 30 day window. I would not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G. Labonte

customer_reviews.title: have worn Reebok tennis shoes for many many yrs. ...
customer_reviews.text: have worn Reebok tennis shoes for many many yrs..never had a pair hurt my feet...these however rub my left toe after only a hr or so of wearing..seem to be narrow where all others are not apparently...ordered a half size bigger than I wear even after reading reviews of others...if you are interested in these shoes I would suggest a full size larger than normal perhaps..
customer_reviews.author: azjimmy

customer_reviews.title: Ran tight on me
customer_reviews.text: The 4E ran a little tight on me. I hope with wearing a few times they will loosen up some.
customer_reviews.author: BM from Boston

customer_reviews.title: little small
customer_reviews.text: great price, just got them today so i don't know how durable they will be but i wanted to let others know that you should order a half size or full size larger than what you normally wear. I usually wear a size 11, i ordered a 11.5 to be safe and they just fit. i would have been happier with a size 12 but they fit good enough.
customer_reviews.author: twylyte

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I had a pair that I completely wore out and had not been able to find any more. Saw these on Amazon and grabbed 2 pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Dezyninglady

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Man!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and the size 10.5 fits perfect. This is the 3rd pair of Reebok's I purchased and I wear them all and they do wear very well.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Black Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a slightly narrow foot. Good fit - walked two theme parks for 4 long days in a row and there is no foot pain. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Corgihart

customer_reviews.title: 12 too tight for size 11 foot.
customer_reviews.text: They are nice looking shoes, I actually wear a size 11, but I always buy size 12 because I have wide feet. These size 12 shoes were still way too tight for me. I sent them back, so I cannot give any further opinion on these.
customer_reviews.author: Classapcs

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam in these shoes make them too tight. Usually shoes will break in after a couple of days of wear, but these didn't. I love Reebok shoes, but the memory foam just makes them too tight. I would have thought that shoe manufacturers would have figured this out.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Watson

customer_reviews.title: The price was great!
customer_reviews.text: Reebok are the only athletic shoes wide enough for my toe area. New Balance are ok for short term wear only. The price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Marv.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like the way the shoe size is measured has changed
customer_reviews.text: I've purchase this Reebok sneaker many times and this is the first time the size I normal get 10.5 is smaller like a size 10. I would most likely order a size 11 next time. Even though I normal shoe size is 10.5. I've been purchasing Reebok footwear for over 25 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. McCarter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoe for my dad he is very active and ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoe for my dad he is very active and hard on shoes these wear and feel great on, would recommend these as a good quality pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: carla honaker

customer_reviews.title: I love Reeboks
customer_reviews.text: I love that Reebok still makes leather shoes. They fit the same as when I bought Reeboks 10 years ago. My feet are narrow and I have a high arch. I've tried other bradns and none of them fit right. They felt so comfortable I immediately ordered another pair to have for later.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: like the look and very comfortable,nice change from some of the other brands
customer_reviews.author: James M. Mott

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: My current shoes are 10.5W. W = 2E. They had only D/M or 4E, no 2E. I ordered the D because I tried on a pair of 4E at the Reebok store and they were way too wide.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: very easy process and ordered a slightly larger pair
customer_reviews.text: I returned them; very easy process and ordered a slightly larger pair. The shoe was exactly what I wanted just a little small. There is little arch support, but I have flat feet so doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Once they broke in they were comfortable enough to wear
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit a little narrow in the toe area compared to others but over all it was worth the price. Once they broke in they were comfortable enough to wear. If you are going to order these order a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Gomes

customer_reviews.title: I've owned several Reebok shoes and like how the fit
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several Reebok shoes and like how the fit; these training shoes fit good and are very comfortable. Some shoes it takes a while to break them in, but not these..even on the first day I received them I can wear them all day with no problems. Very comfortable and good support.
customer_reviews.author: Todd D.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a 4E shoe and there is plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 4E shoe and there is plenty of room. This shoe does seem a bit heavy and stiff so I may not get it again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly and are as described, I have worn these and the end for over 12 years they are great for walking shoes on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: These were a gift for my husband who has wide ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband who has wide feet. He prefers Reeboks over all other sneakers for their support and comfort. In my opinion, not the most stylish sneaker out there, but that's not important to him. Will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lili Fox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe, sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: First pair 13 were too small, had to go to a 14 in this shoe. Good Quality comfortable shoe, do yourself a favor and opt for a larger size then normal
customer_reviews.author: Home NJ

customer_reviews.title: Had to glue bottoms
customer_reviews.text: Had to glue bottom soles on both shoes. Never happened w my nikes
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a good sneaker. Arrived on time and it fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buying shoes on Amazon is great!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ever buying a pair of shoes online & was very happy that I did. I wear a 94E (wide) & selections are always limited at box stores. I wanted a pair that are black, as not to show dirt.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Tighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and even for me the shoe seems tight. I somewhat expect them to loosen up after a while. The memory foam makes my feet sweat quite a bit. The shoe laces are too long, but that seems the norm with new shoes. I will be buying new laces that are more suitable.
customer_reviews.author: tomwoodsv

customer_reviews.title: Sole was too rigid
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable BUT the sole is extremely rigid and thick. Maybe because I got the extra wide option, but do not expect to run or do any athletic activity with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 4 pair so far, Satisfied with fit and Quality.
customer_reviews.author: rhs3502

customer_reviews.title: I love my reeboks
customer_reviews.text: I love my reeboks, they're the only shoes I can wear, but our store went out of business in our area. I was happy to find them on Amazon, but I miss my buy two get one free deals at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great product {as usual} from Reebok
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as expected, Reebok never lets me down. Easy all day walking shoe. Good colors, comfort and style. Plus I love getting a shoe that NO ONE has touched since it left the factory and NO ONE has had a chance to try on before me!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband. It was time to get new sneakers but our busy schedule made it hard to find time to go shopping. I was so happy to find the same exact ones that he wears. They fit great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, However, a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes that look very good it is good for few hours walk light and supportive However, a bit narrow price was very good so over all I am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Yuval

customer_reviews.title: They arrived very quickly after they were ordered and he was very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my husband and he loves them! They arrived very quickly after they were ordered and he was very happy with them. I was relieved because he is extremely picky and I ordered them without him seeing them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Eckhardt

customer_reviews.title: I'm wearing them right now actually!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned in my life. Hands down. You should seriously consider giving these a buy, the price is reasonable and for the rest of the shoe life you will be in foot nirvana.
customer_reviews.author: blondwizard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, right size and true to fit. Great price fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not Well Padded
customer_reviews.text: Nothing royal about this one, no sufficient padding. Got the DMX Max shoe instead and returned this one. The DMX line is amazing, except that it squeaks after a few week of wearing when the first micro-hole has formed. But I digress...
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Holden

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens Royal Trainer MT-M Royal Trainer Mt
product_meta.description: Slip on the reebok royal trainer for a workout shoe that can keep up with you. A memory tech sock liner provides a cushioned footbed for ultimate comfort, while a durable outsole makes these shoes last. Forefoot flex grooves and a low-cut profile give you superior mobility.
feature_bullets: Mid-height trainer featuring side support overlay with grid-textured logos
